ingredients: 1/4 cup all-purpose flour or almond flour
steps: Poke sweet potatoes with fork several times. Microwave on high 8-10 minutes, flipping halfway, until very soft. Let cool 5 minutes
Scoop flesh from skins into large bowl. Mash until smooth and let cool to room temperature
Preheat the oven (400F) or airfrier (375F), then prepare the appropriate tray by spraying lightly with oil or using parchment paper for baking
Add cheese, flour, egg, garlic powder, onion powder, salt, and pepper. Mix until well combined
Scoop 1 Tbsp of mixture and shape into small cylinder (tot shape). If using, for extra crispy exterior, roll the formed tots in breadcrumbs or panko. Place onto the prpared cooking surface
> Repeat with remaining mixture, spacing tots 1 inch apart
> For airfrying, cook at 375Â°F for 12-15 minutes; shake to rotate the tops halfway through
> For the oven, bake 15 minutes, carefully flip each tot, then bake another 15-20 minutes until golden brown and crispy
Cool 5 minutes before serving. Serve with ketchup or ranch for dipping
title: Sweet Potato Tots
